node.address: Carrera 2 #9-46, La Candelaria, Bogotá , Bogota, Colombia

content.value:
We are an independent photography hostel offering he best quality at the most affordable prices.

That´s how we created a space where people can live, share ideas and exchange experiences about travelling while also falling in love with photography. We even have our own gallery where guests can browse through or purchase photographs. That’s our hostel. So if you can to stay at a chilled, familiar and cozy boutique hostel, this is definitely your place.

Fernweh Photography Hostel is situated in the charming area of downtown Bogota known as La Candelaria. We are 3 minutes from “El Chorro de Quevedo”, 7 minutes from the main square of Bolivar, as well from the most important museums such as: Museo Botero and Museo del Oro, among others.

description.description: The project began in 2015 when we, travellers ourselves, decided to find a place where we could share and combine the two things we love most: travelling and photography. FERNWEH is situated in in the charming area of downtown Bogota known as La Candelaria.  We offer friendly service in a safe environment – beautiful rooms and the option to add breakfast.
